Contributing to tiltIndicator

Source: .github/CONTRIBUTING.md

This project follows a number of guides, principles, and books. The more familiar you are with them, the faster your contribution will be approved.

Guides and principles:

  • tiltIndicator mvp guide.
  • Tidyverse style guide.
  • Tidyverse design guide.
  • Tidyverse code review principles.

Books:

  • Happy Git with R.
  • What they forgot to teach you about R.
  • R for data science.
  • Advanced R.
  • R packages.

Developed by Kalash Singhal, Mauro Lepore, Anne Schoenauer, Tilman Trompke, Linda Delacombaz, Lyanne Ho, 2 Degrees Investing Initiative.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.1.
